title: Doll Garden
original_name: 鳥篭姫園(ドールガーデン)
sinopse:
In the moonlit night, the beautiful girls secretly whisper, "I love you, my cute one." Yes, they are young girl prostitutes known as "Dolls." Without knowing love or morals, they are taught the skills to please and soothe a man. And tonight as well?

(Source: ShoujoMagic)
